price: 31. (Los salvamos) del Faraón. Ciertamente, él fue soberbio y transgresor.
arabic: مِن فِرۡعَوۡنَۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ عَالِيٗا مِّنَ ٱلۡمُسۡرِفِينَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: min fir'ʿawna innahu kāna ʿāliyan mina al-mus'rifīna
